data.name: Acropolis Nights
data.short_description: Join us every Friday for a breathtaking experience over the iconic city of Athens. Acropolis Nights, hosted by Hellenic vACC, is your weekly opportunity to immerse yourself in the magic of aviation and explore Athens like never before! See you there!
data.description: Join us every Friday for a breathtaking experience over the iconic city of Athens. Acropolis Nights, hosted by Hellenic vACC, is your weekly opportunity to immerse yourself in the magic of aviation and explore Athens like never before. Our experienced controllers will make sure to provide you with full ATC coverage over Athens International Airport ''Eleftherios Venizelos" whilst you enjoy the spectacular views over the Acropolis. So what are you waiting for? Mark your calendars and we will see you in our virtual skies!

data.name: Discover Romania
data.short_description: Your last chance to fly into Romanian airspace with full ATC in 2023. Every Friday, we open the gates to three more airports, just for YOU. So, let's go on an adventure and Discover Romania!
data.description:
vACC Romania invite pilots to the "Discover Romania" event! Picture this: any Romanian airport opened for 3 hours of realistic control, every Friday evening starting at 18 UTC. You can take off and land from anywhere you fancy. The key? Exploring the beauty of Romania! See you there!

[Charts and Sceneries](https://rovacc.ro/)

data.name: Adria New Year Party
data.short_description: Welcome to Adria New Year party - lasting for full 12 hours! Expect many airports around 6 FIRs Adria is covering or a complete top-down service provided, wherever you decide to go! Happy New Year and let us celebrate together!
data.description:
Welcome to Adria New Year party - lasting for full 12 hours! Expect many airports around 6 FIRs Adria is covering or a complete top-down service provided, wherever you decide to go! Happy New Year and let us celebrate together!

Expect most of the airports around Adria to be open at various times during the day. For up-to-date availability do check our Discord channel.

Once again, happy New Year - let us start it together in Adria!

data.name: Vienna Trainee-Night
data.short_description: We invite you to join our "Trainee-Night" on every second Monday! During this time, we will be staffing our Training-Airport Vienna (LOWW) and make sure to have as many of our Trainees as possible on our frequencies!
data.description:
Dear pilots!
We invite you to join our "Trainee-Night" every second Monday! During this time we will be staffing our Training-Airport Vienna (LOWW) and make sure to have as many of our Trainees as possible on our frequencies! Take the chance to support us in training our controllers by visiting one of the airports, no matter if you fly VFR or IFR and enjoy the additional opportunity to visit Vienna during full staffing! Our trainees will be glad to be provided with a lot of traffic to get their controlling to the next level!
We are looking forward to welcoming you!
Charts and Briefing: [Charts](https://www.vacc-austria.org/?page=content/chartlist&icao=LOWW) | [Briefing](https://downloads.vacc-austria.org/Documents/Briefings/2019_VIE_Briefing_V1.3.pdf)
See you in the skies!

data.name: Düsseldorf Monday
data.short_description: We open our training airport Düsseldorf (EDDL) from ground to center for you every week and you are cordially invited to your flight.
data.description:
No matter whether you want to explore the beautiful Rhineland and Ruhr area by VFR or whether you want to start or end an IFR short, medium or long-haul flight.

Discover the versatility of the airport from a different angle and have a look.

We hope to hear you on our frequency.

data.name: Vectors to Copenhagen
data.short_description: Come and get vectors to the final in Copenhagen! We are ready once again on Monday from 18z with full staffing.
data.description:
VATSIM Scandinavia and Copenhagen FIR extend a warm invitation to our enhanced weekly event, Vectors to Copenhagen! Brace yourself for three action-packed hours of full staffing, running from 18z to 21z. Our team of  controllers is geared up to guide you seamlessly into the captivating capital of Denmark.

Embark on your flight ahead of time for a picturesque landing in Copenhagen, allowing for a leisurely turnaround with ample time to jet back. Alternatively, flip the script and set out on a thrilling adventure from Copenhagen to explore Europe's stunning landscapes. With three hours at your disposal, you can traverse multiple scenic destinations. But beware! The later you join, the more intense the aerial traffic will become!

Ensure your charts are in check, dust off your aircraft from the hangar, and mark your presence at this electrifying event. We look forward to seeing you in the virtual skies!

[Briefings, Charts and everything you need to know is here!](https://vatsim-scandinavia.org/pilots/airports-charts/airport/ekch/) 

[Check the ATC bookings here ](https://vatsim-scandinavia.org/)

data.name: Lapland Tuesday
data.short_description: See and touch the magic of Lapland every Tuesday during the winter! Three of Lapland's biggest airports are fully staffed and serving virtual Lapland travelers the whole winter season!
data.description:
Airport briefing and charts:

* [EFRO](https://wiki.vatsim-scandinavia.org/books/finnish-airports-charts/page/efro-rovaniemi)
* [EFIV](https://wiki.vatsim-scandinavia.org/books/finnish-airports-charts/page/efiv-ivalo)
* [EFKT](https://wiki.vatsim-scandinavia.org/books/finnish-airports-charts/page/efkt-kittila)

data.name: [ESGG_TWR] | S2 Exam
data.short_description: Melvin is having his S2 check at ESGG on the 3rd of January 17,30-19,30z.
data.description:
Come and help Melvin prove his worthiness of the S2 rating. Take out your small propeller aircraft, helicopter, or jet aircraft and fly to/from ESGG either IFR och VFR.

Charts can be found here: https://aro.lfv.se/Editorial/View/IAIP?folderId=31

data.name: Slovak Online Day
data.short_description: Why not come to Slovakia to have a good Air Traffic Services for your flight in Bratislava FIR? We guarantee you, we won't let you down, all we can do is help! So come to Bratislava FIR to have some fun!
data.description:
**Why not come to Slovakia to have a good Air Traffic Services for your flight in Bratislava FIR? We guarantee you, we won't let you down, all we can do is help! So come to Bratislava FIR to have some fun!**

About Slovak Online Day:

-Starting event from 18:00z to 21:00z every Wednesday

-Full ATC coverage in Slovakia

-Friendly Slovak controllers will take you safely to your destinations

For sceneries and charts, visit [http://vacc-slovakia.sk/](http://vacc-slovakia.sk/)

See you in there !

data.name: VACC-Austria Weekly Wednesday
data.short_description: Weekly Wednesday - every Wednesday - 1830-2130z - FULL ATC in Austria
data.description:
Enjoy extended coverage of FULL ATC across the entire country. Take your favourite aircraft out of the hanger for a spin to our majors Vienna (LOWW) and/or the infamous Innsbruck Airport (LOWI). Alternatively enjoy a flight to our breath-taking minors: Salzburg (LOWS), Graz (LOWG), Klagenfurt (LOWK) or Linz (LOWL). Of course, we are providing full CPDLC and PDC service along the way!

Take a break from your busy schedule and enjoy an evening with 3 hours of guaranteed ATC-service "as real as it gets"! We are very excited to welcome you to one of our airports!

data.name: RegionNL Rotterdam The Hague
data.short_description: The Dutch VACC invites you to our RegionNL online day where we fully staff one of our local gems. This time Rotterdam The Hague Airport (EHRD | RTM), the third busiest airport in the Netherlands, is in the spotlights on the 3rd of January between 1830 and 2030z.
data.description:
The Dutch VACC invites you to our **RegionNL online day** where we fully staff one of our local gems. This time **Rotterdam The Hague Airport** (EHRD | RTM), the third busiest airport in the Netherlands, is in the spotlights on the **3rd of January** between **1830 and 2030z**.
The airport sees daily holiday flights, multiple flights to London City and a lot of general aviation traffic. It's also home to the lifeliner 2 ambulance helicopter.

Charts can be found [here](https://www.dutchvacc.nl/charts/) or [here](https://eaip.lvnl.nl/web/2023-11-16-AIRAC/html/eAIP/EH-AD-2.EHRD-en-GB.html#ehrd-ad-2.24) (both IFR and VFR)
Scenery: MSFS has great default scenery for Rotterdam! or use [MSFS/XP11](https://www.rdpresets.com/rotterdam-v2-fs2020.html) | [P3D v4/v5](https://www.nl-2000.com/2018/12/nl2000-version-5-0-download-instructions-and-locations/) | [FSX/P3D v3-](https://www.nl-2000.com/2010/05/nl2000-version-40-download-instructions-and-locations/)

Hope to talk to you on the radio!

data.name: Roma Nights
data.short_description: Dear pilots, VATITA is welcoming you all to fly in the Rome FIR, where we'll offer just the best of services, from the top to the bottom, also covering the airports of Fiumicino (LIRF) and Ciampino (LIRA).
data.description:
Dear pilots, **VATITA is welcoming you all** to fly in the Rome FIR, where we'll offer **just the best of services,** from the top to the bottom, covering the airports of Fiumicino (**LIRF**) and Ciampino (**LIRA**).

Pick your favorite plane, and fly in and out of our beautiful country, maybe connecting with our dear neighbors!
Theres something for everyone, so contact Roma on 124.200!

[LIRF Pilot Briefing, sceneries and charts](https://www.vats.im/it/LIRFBrief)

data.name: [ESGG_TWR] | S2 Exam
data.short_description: Ansgar is having his S2 check at ESGG on the 4th of January 17,30-19,30z.
data.description:
Come and help Ansgar  prove his worthiness of the S2 rating. Take out your small propeller aircraft, helicopter, or jet aircraft and fly to/from ESGG either IFR och VFR.

Charts can be found here: https://aro.lfv.se/Editorial/View/IAIP?folderId=31

data.name: Welcome to HEL
data.short_description: VATSIM Scandinavia and Finland invite you to enjoy our weekly event, Welcome to HEL. Helsinki Airport will be fully staffed by our air traffic controllers every Thursday 1800z-2100z.
data.description:
VATSIM Scandinavia and Finland invite you to enjoy our weekly event, Welcome to HEL. Helsinki will be fully staffed by our air traffic controllers every Thursday 1800z-2100z.

A rapidly growing team of controllers is looking forward to guiding you into Helsinki Airport (EFHK). Helsinki Control (EFIN_CTR) will also provide top-down service all across Finnish airspace. We guarantee professional, flexible and friendly service across the entirety of Finland.

See you on Thursday!

[Briefing](https://vatsim-scandinavia.org/pilots/airports-charts/airport/efhk/) and [Charts](https://www.ais.fi/aip/ad/efhk/efhk.htm)

data.name: Riga Friday Fun
data.short_description: We invite you to take part in our Friday party in Riga. This Friday from 1700 to 2100 Zulu, we are ready to provide ATC coverage with friendly and fun controllers!
data.description: We invite you to take part in our Friday party in Riga. This Friday from 1700 to 2100 Zulu, we are ready to provide ATC coverage with friendly and fun controllers!

data.name: Istanbul Online
data.short_description: Europe's biggest and busiest airport, Istanbul Airport (LTFM) is waiting for you this Friday! Join us for friendly and quality ATC service between 17:00z - 20:00z and experience parallel approaches unlike other before! Don't forget to check out the special wiki page we prepared!
data.description:
Europe's biggest and busiest airport, **Istanbul Airport (LTFM)** is waiting for you this Friday! Join us for friendly and quality ATC service between **17:00z - 20:00z** and experience parallel approaches unlike other before! Don't forget to check out the special wiki page we have prepared for you as well! See you in the radar!

[https://wiki.trvacc.net/wiki/Istanbul_Airport](https://wiki.trvacc.net/wiki/Istanbul_Airport)

data.name: Baltic Jam
data.short_description:
EETT, EYVL, UMKK and EVRR FIR invite you to join in on the fun of the Baltic Jam return! 
We are staffing up the Baltic Region for you to enjoy some ATC service.
data.description: How long ago did you join VATSIM? If you're one of the older members of the network, you'll surely enjoy the return of this absolute classic – **Baltic Jam** is an iconic event that returns to the 4 Baltic FIRs on **the 5th of January 2024**. Obviously, newer members are welcome as much as the seasoned ones to join the fun at Riga, Tallinn, Vilnius, or Kaliningrad. From now on, this event will be hosted every 1st Friday of the month. Fly under any flight rules in and out of **EVRR, EETT, EYVL, or UMKK FIR**, all of which will be staffed top-down and join the **Baltic Jam**!

data.name: Paris By Night
data.short_description: Like every first Friday of the month you are welcome in Paris ! On Friday 5th of January, come fly from/to Paris Charles de Gaulle (LFPG) from 1930z to 22z. Experience Paris Charles de Gaulle at its busiest, with fully ATC coverage !
data.description: Like every first Friday of the month you are welcome in Paris ! On Friday 5th of January, come fly from/to Paris Charles de Gaulle (LFPG) from 1930z to 22z. Experience Paris Charles de Gaulle at its busiest, with fully ATC coverage ! Come and experience multiple frequencies changes, parallel approaches in one of the busiest airport in the world ! ✈️

data.name: Saturday Night Ops Budapest
data.short_description: Enjoy the night as you fly in/out of the Hungarian capital from 1800z, every second Saturday!
data.description:
Every two weeks, we light up the airspace over LHBP - Budapest so you can enjoy the night as you fly in/out of the Hungarian capital with a beautiful evening scenery! Budapest can easily facilitate large jets as well as small GAs, so feel free to grab your favourite aircraft and join the event! You can expect coverage from 18:00z. See you there!

[Briefing Charts](http://vacchun.hu/en/terkepek-es-scenery/)

data.name: SMATSA's 20th Birthday Party
data.short_description: VATAdria presents: SMATSA's 20th Birthday Party
data.description: SMATSA, the Air Traffic Services provider for Serbia and Montenegro, experienced its 20th anniversary at the tail end of 2023. In order to celebrate such a momentous occasion, we will be staffing the LYBA FIR between the hours of 1700 and 2000. We hope you can join us for this one of a kind event!

data.name: Stuttgart Sunday
data.short_description: Prepare for Stuttgart Sunday! No matter whether you are flying a small plane or a jet, IFR or VFR, if it flies it is welcome here.
data.description:
**Prepare for Stuttgart Sunday!** No matter whether you are flying a small plane or a jet, IFR or VFR, if it flies it is welcome here. From 20:00lcl to 22:00lcl (18:00z to 20:00z in the summer and **19:00z to 21:00z in the winter**) there will be a mix of old stagers and new trainees controlling for you. Fly from Stuttgart over the Swabian Jura, to Lake Constance or follow the Neckar to the Rhine. As destination for your IFR-Flights we would recommend Hanover, where RG Bremen is performing Hanover Onlineday and you can almost be sure of full ATC coverage.

**Charts:** [chartfox.org/EDDS](https://chartfox.org/EDDS) **Pilot Briefing:** [vats.im/edds](https://vats.im/edds)

data.name: Cross the Nordic Seas

routes.route: OSKUM DCT 63N010W DCT IPTON DCT ETNOR
REKLI DCT ERSER DCT ING DCT NASBU

data.short_description: Embark on a virtual journey across the Nordic Seas with VATSIM Scandinavia's "Cross the Nordic Seas!" Immerse yourself in the stunning landscapes and challenging approaches of Bergen (ENBR), Vagar (EKVG), and Keflavik (BIKF.) Join this cross country adventure!
data.description: Embark on a virtual journey across the Nordic Seas with VATSIM Scandinavia's "Cross the Nordic Seas," hosted by Norway, Iceland, and Denmark! Navigate the scenic skies and immerse yourself in the stunning landscapes and challenging approaches of Bergen (ENBR), Vagar (EKVG), and Keflavik (BIKF.) Join aviation enthusiasts in this cross-country adventure, showcasing the beauty of Nordic aviation and the collaborative spirit of VATSIM Scandinavia.

data.name: Vectors to Copenhagen
data.short_description: Come get Vectors to final in Copenhagen! We are ready once again Monday already from 18z with full staffing. Come join!
data.description:
VATSIM Scandinavia and Copenhagen FIR extend a warm invitation to our enhanced weekly event, Vectors to Copenhagen! Brace yourself for three action-packed hours of full staffing, running from 18z to 21z. Our team of  controllers is geared up to guide you seamlessly into the captivating capital of Denmark.

Embark on your flight ahead of time for a picturesque landing in Copenhagen, allowing for a leisurely turnaround with ample time to jet back. Alternatively, flip the script and set out on a thrilling adventure from Copenhagen to explore Europe's stunning landscapes. With three hours at your disposal, you can traverse multiple scenic destinations. But beware! The later you join, the more intense the aerial traffic will become!

Ensure your charts are in check, dust off your aircraft from the hangar, and mark your presence at this electrifying event. We look forward to seeing you in the virtual skies!

[Briefings, Charts and everything you need to know is here!](https://vatsim-scandinavia.org/pilots/airports-charts/airport/ekch/) 

[Check the ATC bookings here ](https://vatsim-scandinavia.org/)

data.name: Turn Around Budapest
data.short_description: We kindly invite every pilot to Turn around Budapest on Mondays - a weekly event featuring Full ATC coverage over the Hungarian airspace.
data.description:
From 18z until 21z you can expect full coverage in the Hungarian airspace, including LHBP - Budapest, LHDC - Debrecen and LHSM - Sármellék/Hévíz-Balaton.
Grab a cup of tea or some snacks and plan for a great evening in the Budapest FIR.

[Briefing](http://vacchun.hu/en/repuloterek/)
[Charts](http://vacchun.hu/en/terkepek-es-scenery/)

data.name: Slovak Online Day
data.short_description: Why not come to Slovakia to have a good Air Traffic Services for your flight in Bratislava FIR? We guarantee you, we won't let you down, all we can do is help! So come to Bratislava FIR to have some fun!

data.name: Czech Online Day
data.short_description: Czech Online Day takes place every Wednesday between 18 and 21 UTC at LKAA FIR. You can expect full ATC coverage at Prague LKPR.
data.description: Czech Online Day takes place every Wednesday between 18 and 21 UTC at LKAA FIR. You can expect full ATC coverage at Prague LKPR.

data.name: Milano nights
data.short_description: Dear pilots, VATITA is welcoming you all to fly in the Milan FIR, where we'll offer just the best of services, from the top to the bottom, covering the airports of Malpensa (LIMC), Bergamo (LIME) and Linate (LIML). We'll see you there!
data.description:
Dear pilots,**VATITA is welcoming you all** to fly in the Milan FIR, where we'll offer just the best of services, from  top to bottom, covering the airports of Malpensa (LIMC), Bergamo (LIME) and Linate (LIML).

Pick your favorite plane, and fly in and out of our beautiful country, maybe connecting with our dear neighbors!

There's something for everyone, so contact Milano on 127.450!

[LIMC pilot briefing, charts and sceneries](https://vats.im/it/LIMCBrief)

data.name: Welcome to HEL
data.short_description: VATSIM Scandinavia and Finland invite you to enjoy our weekly event, Welcome to HEL. Helsinki Airport will be fully staffed by our air traffic controllers every Thursday 1800z-2100z.
data.description:
VATSIM Scandinavia and Finland invite you to enjoy our weekly event, Welcome to HEL. Helsinki will be fully staffed by our air traffic controllers every Thursday 1800z-2100z.

A rapidly growing team of controllers is looking forward to guiding you into Helsinki Airport (EFHK). Helsinki Control (EFIN_CTR) will also provide top-down service all across Finnish airspace. We guarantee professional, flexible and friendly service across the entirety of Finland.

See you on Thursday!

data.name: Focus on Malta
data.short_description: Come visit the beautiful Malta with your favourite airline, or check the nearby islands of Gozo and Comino with a VFR flight; maybe do both?
data.description:
Come visit the beautiful **Malta** with your favourite airline, or check the nearby islands of **Gozo** and **Comino** with a VFR flight; maybe do both?
Since there are few runway exits, be prepared to vacate as soon as practical, otherwise you'll have to perform a backtrack, and that 777 on short final won't be happy.
**On Saturday April 9th, from 12:00 to 16:00z** our air traffic controllers will guide you in and out of Malta international airport!

data.name: European Overload 2024
data.short_description: Get ready to join a spectacular event across Europe in the European Overload, brought to you by VATEUD and VATSIM UK. This event offers an unparalleled opportunity to fly through some of Europe's most iconic and diverse airspaces.
data.description:
Get ready to join a spectacular event across Europe in the **European Overload**, brought to you by **VATEUD and VATSIM UK**. This event offers an unparalleled opportunity to fly through some of Europe's most iconic and diverse airspaces.

This year's European Overload Event promises an immersive experience, covering a vast range of European countries. From the Nordic fjords to the Mediterranean coast, this event is a celebration of Europe's rich and varied landscapes and cultures.

This event is all about your choices and experiences. Whether you prefer buzzing city airports or tranquil regional hubs, there's a flight path for every preference.

So take a seat in your cockpit, prepare for your flights and let us light up Europe on **January 13 from 1500 - 2000z**!


To ensure that everything runs smoothly on the day, we have put together a few useful links for you:

* Charts: [chartfox.org](https://chartfox.org)
* Routes: [grd.aero-nav.com](https://grd.aero-nav.com)

data.name: Stuttgart Sunday
data.short_description: Prepare for Stuttgart Sunday! No matter whether you are flying a small plane or a jet, IFR or VFR, if it flies it is welcome here.

Fly from Stuttgart over the Swabian Jura, to Lake Constance or follow the Neckar to the Rhine. As destination for your IFR-Flights we would recommend Hanover, where RG Bremen is performing Hanover Onlineday and you can almost be sure of full ATC coverage.

**Charts:** [chartfox.org/EDDS](https://chartfox.org/EDDS) **Pilot Briefing:** [vats.im/edds](https://vats.im/edds)

data.description:
VATSIM Scandinavia and Finland invite you to enjoy our weekly event, Welcome to HEL. Helsinki will be fully staffed by our air traffic controllers every Thursday 1800z-2100z.

A rapidly growing team of controllers is looking forward to guiding you into Helsinki Airport (EFHK). Helsinki Control (EFIN_CTR) will also provide top-down service all across Finnish airspace. We guarantee professional, flexible and friendly service across the entirety of Finland.

See you on Thursday!

[Briefing](https://vatsim-scandinavia.org/pilots/airports-charts/airport/efhk/) and [Charts](https://www.ais.fi/aip/ad/efhk/efhk.htm)

data.name: Vectors to Copenhagen
data.short_description: Come and get vectors to the final in Copenhagen! We are ready once again on Monday from 18z with full staffing.
data.description:
VATSIM Scandinavia and Copenhagen FIR extend a warm invitation to our enhanced weekly event, Vectors to Copenhagen! Brace yourself for three action-packed hours of full staffing, running from 18z to 21z. Our team of  controllers is geared up to guide you seamlessly into the captivating capital of Denmark.

Embark on your flight ahead of time for a picturesque landing in Copenhagen, allowing for a leisurely turnaround with ample time to jet back. Alternatively, flip the script and set out on a thrilling adventure from Copenhagen to explore Europe's stunning landscapes. With three hours at your disposal, you can traverse multiple scenic destinations. But beware! The later you join, the more intense the aerial traffic will become!

Ensure your charts are in check, dust off your aircraft from the hangar, and mark your presence at this electrifying event. We look forward to seeing you in the virtual skies!

[Briefings, Charts and everything you need to know is here!](https://vatsim-scandinavia.org/pilots/airports-charts/airport/ekch/) 

[Check the ATC bookings here ](https://vatsim-scandinavia.org/)

data.name: Slovak Online Day
data.short_description: Why not come to Slovakia to have a good Air Traffic Services for your flight in Bratislava FIR? We guarantee you, we won't let you down, all we can do is help! So come to Bratislava FIR to have some fun!
data.description:
[Why not come to Slovakia to have a good Air Traffic Services for your flight in Bratislava FIR? We guarantee you, we won't let you down, all we can do is help! So come to Bratislava FIR to have some fun!](http://)

About Slovak Online Day:

-Starting event from 18:00z to 21:00z every Wednesday

-Full ATC coverage in Slovakia

-Friendly Slovak controllers will take you safely to your destinations

For sceneries and charts, visit [http://vacc-slovakia.sk/](http://vacc-slovakia.sk/)

See you in there !

data.short_description: Czech Online Day takes place every Wednesday between 18 and 21 UTC at LKAA FIR. You can expect full ATC coverage at Prague LKPR.

data.name: RegionNL Rotterdam The Hague
data.short_description: The Dutch VACC invites you to our RegionNL online day where we fully staff one of our local gems. This time Rotterdam The Hague Airport (EHRD | RTM), the third busiest airport in the Netherlands, is in the spotlights on the 31st of January between 1830 and 2030z.
data.description:
The Dutch VACC invites you to our **RegionNL online day** where we fully staff one of our local gems. This time **Rotterdam The Hague Airport** (EHRD | RTM), the third busiest airport in the Netherlands, is in the spotlights on the **31st of January** between **1830 and 2030z**.
The airport sees daily holiday flights, multiple flights to London City and a lot of general aviation traffic. It's also home to the lifeliner 2 ambulance helicopter.

Charts can be found [here](https://www.dutchvacc.nl/charts/) or [here](https://eaip.lvnl.nl/web/2023-12-14-AIRAC/html/eAIP/EH-AD-2.EHRD-en-GB.html#ehrd-ad-2.24) (both IFR and VFR)
Scenery: MSFS has great default scenery for Rotterdam! or use [MSFS/XP11](https://www.rdpresets.com/rotterdam-v2-fs2020.html) | [P3D v4/v5](https://www.nl-2000.com/2018/12/nl2000-version-5-0-download-instructions-and-locations/) | [FSX/P3D v3-](https://www.nl-2000.com/2010/05/nl2000-version-40-download-instructions-and-locations/)

Hope to talk to you on the radio!
